about_the_game:
A cozy cooking experience

Serve hot and tasty meals to your customers. As you cook unlock 9 Japanese-inspired recipes some with multiple variations. Cooking opens the hearts of those around you as you cook you will meet friendly faces.

Small moments that matter

At The Rice & Rest, you do more than just cook you create a space for connection. A warm meal and a friendly ear can brighten someone’s day, ease their worries, or even spark new friendships. Some moments are lighthearted and fun, others thoughtful and introspective.

The friends you make along the way

7 characters for you to cook for, chat with, and befriend. As you expand your menu and earn loyal customers you will learn more of their lives and stories. You might also learn more of why you are here and about the world you are in.

There’s a wide variety of characters to meet from a robot trying to understand themselves, and an orc adjusting to city life, to a wizard detective and his assistant investigating a magical crime, and more.

name: Rice & Rest
short_description: Rice & Rest is a visual novel where you run a small food truck at the side of a city street. Cook meals and meet the cast of interesting and sometimes weird characters of the modern fantasy city where you unexpectedly find yourself.
